channel.title: Custom Rights InsidiaX
channel.description:
Need help, I've been trying to add different rights, such as a SUPPORT right, but when I try to change the yell command it doesn't work. It is fine MOD+ but since my isdonator=1 I always yell donator. Sorry if that sentence was hard to comprehend, but here's a picture of what I mean:
[IMG]http://i307.photobucket.com/albums/nn288/Nickmanmojo55/2012-12-10_1922.png[/img]
Thanks in advance!

+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
}

[/code]

Hows that looking?[/quote]

nardo exactly what i said earlier will work if you have common sense

item.title: Custom Rights InsidiaX
item.dc:creator: @nardoscape nardoscape
item.description:
@nardoscape wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:24, topic:472348”][quote author=nardoscape link=topic=590094.msg4177978#msg4177978 date=1355189838]

You have to start somewhere. I’m going to need help from people. There are not tutorials on every single line of java code that can be made within an RSPS. I just wanted some help writing a code for yell and you two are having a huge debate over spoonfeeding :s. I don’t sit on mopar all day making new threads on everything I cannot do, I try to figure out what I can myself. If I can’t find a tut on it or do it myself then I come to the HELP section.

Just try what we’ve suggested and check out the results.

I did try out what both you guys suggested, and it still does not work properly. Sorry for being a burden
[/quote]
We suggested the same thing in different forms.
What one is incorrect, the login or the yell?[/quote]

The yell is incorrect

item.title: Custom Rights InsidiaX
item.dc:creator: @nardoscape nardoscape
item.description:
@nardoscape wrote:

I changed up the code, but it still tells me I’m a donator when I yell, here is the new code

}else if (c.playerRights == 1){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=16711935>[MOD]</col><shad=16711935> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 2){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=16776960>[ADMIN]</col><shad=16776960> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 3){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=65535>[DEVELOPER]</col><shad=65535> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.isDonator == 1){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=5893412>[DONATOR]</col><shad=392218> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 4){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=65348>[DONATOR]</col> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 5 && c.isDonator == 1 ){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=255>[SUPPORT]</col><shad=255> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 0){ c2.sendMessage("<shad=5073110>[PLAYER]</col> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");[code/]

Read full topic

if( player is donor && he has these rights)
{
Yell (title and all that jargon)
}

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Rights InsidiaX
item.dc:creator: @nardoscape nardoscape
item.description:
@nardoscape wrote:

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”) || playerCommand.startsWith(“Yell”) || playerCommand.startsWith(“YELL”) || playerCommand.startsWith(“yELL”)) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() < c.muteEnd) {
c.sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell for another " + c.muteEnd + " Seconds.”);
return;
} else {
c.muteEnd = 0;
}
if (Connection.isMuted©) {
c.sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell.”);
return;
}
/*
This is the sensor for the yell command
/
String text = playerCommand.substring(5);
String[] bad = {“all join my server”, “all join my new server”, “tradereq”, “. com”, “c0m”, “love you”,
“org”, “net”, “biz”, “. net”, “. org”, “. biz”,
“. no-ip”, “- ip”, “.no-ip.biz”, “no-ip.org”, “servegame”,
“.com”, “.net”, “.org”, “no-ip”, "", “is gay”, "**",
“vagina”, “rubbish”, “. com”, “. serve”, “. no-ip”, “. net”, “. biz”, “leeched”, “this server sucks”};
for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){
if(text.indexOf(bad) >= 0){
return;
}
}
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

                 if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
                    c2.sendMessage("<col=40000><shad=15695415><img=2>[SYSTEM CODER]</col><img=2> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +":<shad=9440238></col> "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415><img=2>[WEBSITE DEVELOPER]</col><img=2> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) {
                    c2.sendMessage("<color=15695415>[CO-OWNER]</col> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerRights == 1){
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=16711935>[MOD]</col><shad=16711935> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerRights == 2){
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=16776960>[ADMIN]</col><shad=16776960> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=65535>[DEVELOPER]</col><shad=65535> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.isDonator == 1){
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=5893412>[DONATOR]</col><shad=392218> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerRights == 4){
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=65348>[DONATOR]</col> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 5){
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=255>[SUPPORT]</col><shad=255> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                 }else if (c.playerRights == 0){
                    c2.sendMessage("<shad=5073110>[PLAYER]</col> "+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");[code/][/code]

Read full topic

why do you all / we all continue to help people using insidia and trisidia? not only are we provoking them to learn poor code, but were spoonfeeding them so they can c&p and probably still love up so they can bring those errors to server help and spam server help even more.

what the love

'Cause we are a helpful community. Plus some people like their bases because of content. Seeing as they are new, they don’t know how to add the content them selves. Don’t like that. Get off mopar. kthnxbai
[/quote]

you mean the leechers? anyways, since they are new they are the NEW generation. we need to teach them better structure then what they’re picking up from working on these PI bases etc.[/quote]
Yes. They are leechers that took a free and released server/client. You know what I started on? I started on a 317 Delta allstar. You tell me how shitty that is. Now I’m working on a close to blank 317 PI (The only thing added was the commonly used methods).
Anyways, don’t be arguing in this guys topic.
